Yes, ProjectKorra is compatible with Spigot/MC $1! The latest version works on 1.16 all the way through to 1.19.3!

The latest version of ProjectKorra only works between Spigot/MC 1.16 to 1.19.3. If you want to use an older version of Minecraft, you'll need to use an older version of PK.

Check the pins in <#300990411353358336> to see the versions compatible with what you want.
